content:
Raemon gently taps the hoversled with his foot. When it doesn't respond, he gives it a firm kick. It sputters a few times, lifts a couple centimeters off the ground, then collapses once more.

"It's broken, all right," Raemon says with a sigh. "Could be the matter harmonizers, or even the molecular phase buffers. Regardless, we'll need to get some stilt-horses out here and tow it back to the artisan's workshop in White Sky for repairs."

Return Raemon, Caravaneer to the collection. Flip RETURN TRIP back to SUPPLY RUN. Each Ranger suffers 3 fatigue.

Return to White Sky to help Raemon with the supply run.
